input: Which one the following statements is not correct?

options.A: The Constitutional Amendment Bill has to be passed by both houses of Parliament separately with special majority
options.B: Constitutional cases in Supreme Court is heard by minimum five judges
options.C: Freedom of press is included in the fundamental right - Freedom of speech and expression.
options.D: Zakir Hussain was the first Vice President of India

explanation: Dr. Zakir Hussain served as second Vice President of India. Dr. Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan was the first Vice President of India.
